api_list.api_description: Get current USD prices of multiple tokens on a network.

required_parameters.name: network
required_parameters.description: Network ID from the /networks list (e.g., eth for Ethereum).

required_parameters.name: addresses
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of token addresses (up to 30 addresses).

query: What is the current price of Ether (ETH) and USD Coin (USDC) on the Ethereum network?
